chapter.text: jab suraj lapet liya jayega
aur jab sitaare be-noor ho jayenge
aur jab pahaad chalaaye jayenge
aur jab das maah ki haamela oontniya chohd di jaaye
aur jab wehshi jaanwar ekhatte kiye jayenge
aur jab samandar bhadkaaye jayenge
aur jab jaane (jismo) se mila di jayegi
aur jab zinda gaadi hoyi ladki se sawaal kiya jayega
ke kis gunaah ki wajeh se wo qatl ki gayi
aur jab naame amaal khol diye jayenge
aur jab asmaan ki khaal utaar li jayegi
aur jab jahannam bhadkaayi jayegi
aur jab jannath nazdeek kardi jayegi
to us din har shaqs jaan lega, jo kuch le kar ayaa hoga
main qasam khaata hoon, piche hatne waale
chalne phirne waale, chupne waale sitaaro ki
aur raath ki jab jaane lage
aur subaah ki jab chamakne lage
yaiqnan ye ek buzrug rasool ka kaha hoa hai
jo quwwath waala hai, arsh waale (Allah) ke nazdeek bulandh martaba hai
jis ki (asmaano mein) ita’ath ki jaati hai, ameen hai
aur tumhaara saathi deewaana nahi hai
us ne us (farishte) ko asmaan ke khule kinaare par dekha bhi hai
aur ye ghayb ki baatho ko batlaane mein baqeel bhi nahi
aur ye Qur’aan shaytaan mardoodh ka kalaam nahi
phir tum kahaa jaa rahe ho
ye to tamaam jahaan waalo ke liye nasihath naama hai
(bil qusoos) us ke liye, jo tum mein se sidhi raah par chalna chaahe
aur tum baghayr parvardigaare aalam ke chaahe, kuch nahi chaah sakte
